feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Clarification on Differences Between SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Demo Systems
entry.content:
We are currently evaluating SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition demo systems and would like to understand the differences between the following two options: https://www.sap.com/products/erp/s4hana.html#security

 

 

  1. Cloud test, demo, and development – one-system landscape

    • Is it possible to create and manage users and business roles in this system?

    • Are there any limitations regarding the number of users?

    • The offering mentions an Entitlements Package – what exactly does this include, and are there any functional or user limitations?

  2. Cloud test, demo, and development – three-system landscape

    • What are the key functional differences compared to the one-system landscape?

    • Why is a minimum of 100 FUE required?

    • Are there differences in user/role management or system separation (DEV/TEST/PROD)?

Our objective is to use the demo system for realistic user, role, and authorization modeling.

Thank you for your clarification.

Kind regards,
Rudi

entry.title: Regarding the transpo of filter variants per app.rt
entry.content:
Dear All.

For each application, I understand that you can define variants for filters and tables. Can these variants be transported? Or do they need to be created for each environment? Please let me know.

entry.title: Primary Bank Account Selection in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

In SAP Public Cloud, when a business partner has several bank accounts maintained in the master data —for example, a supplier— is there any way to set a different account as the main one without having to delete the first account created?

I have carried out several tests and noticed that the system automatically takes the first bank account entered in the business partner master as the main account. To make the second account the main one, I am forced to delete the first one. Is there any option that allows selecting any account as the main one without having to remove any of the existing bank accounts?

I would really appreciate your help.

Thank you all very much.

entry.title: Request for CDS View with Line Item Data of Recurring Journal Entries
entry.content:
Dear SAP Community,

I am currently working on reporting requirements related to recurring journal entries. At present, I have identified the CDS view I_RecurringJournalEntry, which provides the header-level data.

However, I am unable to locate a CDS view that contains the line item details of recurring journal entries. Could you please advise which released CDS view should be used to retrieve the line item data?

Thank you all for your support.

entry.title: Downloading 'Attachments' issue for Material in BTP from Public HANA cloud
entry.content:
I am trying to download attachments for Material through API so I have enabled communication arrangement with scenario, SAP_COM_0105 . But I  am having error as attached  below   :

  • GET http://localhost:4004/odata/v4/material-doc/AttachmentContentSet(DocumentInfoRecordDocType='SL1',DocumentInfoRecordDocNumber='10000000098',DocumentInfoRecordDocVersion='00',DocumentInfoRecordDocPart='000',LogicalDocument='42010A0B7BCE1FD0B5E327F5E97B997A',ArchiveDocumentID='42010A0B7BCE1XXXXXXXX97A',LinkedSAPObjectKey='SL10000000000000010000XXXX',BusinessObjectTypeName='DRAW')/$value
    Accept: application/pdf

    I have few questins regarding this:
    1) Am i hitting the wrong API  or communication secnario?
    2) I also tried post operation for  Attaching pdf to Material  also  but it gave "User has no authorization for operation 01 on object BUS1001006" error despite creation proper communication secnario.
    3) If also tried  fething DIR using the below request :
    "
    GET http://localhost:4004/odata/v4/material-doc/A_DocumentInfoRecordAttch(DocumentInfoRecordDocType='SL1',DocumentInfoRecordDocNumber='10000000098',DocumentInfoRecordDocVersion='00',DocumentInfoRecordDocPart='000')/DocumentInfoRecordToAttachmentNavigation?$top=1"  
    I got he three items  havinf information about the documents but not able to download , So what I am missing ?
    SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Extensibility SRM Printing and Attachments

Kindly give me an option how can this be solved

entry.title: Accruals on subscription licenses
entry.content:
Hi all,

We are using SAP Subscription Billing to manage and bill the subscription licenses we sell to our customers.

Through the integration with S/4HANA, we run Universal Revenue Recognition using Deferral Method 2 (Linear Distribution, Day-Specific, 360-day basis) to spread revenue evenly over the subscription term, resulting in equal monthly revenue (MRR) and pro rate the revenue for the remaining days in the first and last month when a license starts in the middel of the month.

As we act as a reseller, we also incur purchase costs for these licenses for the same subscription period. Our requirement in S/4HANA is to:

  • Create purchase orders;

  • Match them with the corresponding supplier invoices, and

  • Defer and recognize the purchase costs over the subscription term using the same recognition logic as revenue, in order to reflect the correct actual margin per period.

So far, we have not found a standard solution that fully supports this use case. While there are options to defer costs linearly until an end date, these typically rely on a 365-day calendar and do not calculated the initial days in the first month and remaining days in the last month correctly. As a result, the recognized cost per month varies depending on the number of days in the month, which does not align with the fixed-period MRR logic used for revenue.

Has anyone encountered a similar scenario and found a viable solution or workaround in S/4HANA?

entry.title: Migration of legacy independent AUC with year end transfer, posting date and asset value date
entry.content:
When transferring legacy AUC posting data (tty 900) we notice posting date and asset value date is first date of new year, 01/01/2026, and not the transfer date 31/12/2025. 
Is this expected and how to do reconciliation. 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

entry.title: Confirmation of quantities to distributed production orders
entry.content: In the standard cloud system, it is not possible to confirm quantities once the order has been distributed to the MES. Are there any workarounds that would allow quantities to be confirmed in the ERP system?

entry.title: In MTO, SO field in Planned/Purchase Req. is taking quotation/Inquiry no. of Reference Sales Order.
entry.content:
Hello Team,

In MTO scenarios, the generated Planned order/ Purchase Requisition number having the account assignment section where Sales Order field is available is taking the reference of Inquiry/Quotation number for the respective Sales Order. It also results in impacting the report of sales Order based output details.

As per business requirment, the client is expecting the output based on the Sales Order not on the basis of Inquiry/Quotation number for Assigned Sales Order. 

Please suggest how to map the scenario to get the desired result output, without impacting the other modules fundamental concepts like as Costing, Delivery and all.

Also, suggest the advantages and disadvantages of the other functionalities.

entry.title: How to create a business partner of category group in public cloud
entry.content:
Hello, when creating a business partner in the public cloud using the Manage Business Partner Master Data app (F3163), I only have the options "Organization" and "Person", not "Group". How can I enable groups? I can create a group in the Maintain Business Partner app, but this is declared as an unknown object in F3163 and cannot be processed further.

System: Public Cloud 2508
best regars
Tobias

entry.title: SAP S/4 Hana Public Cloud Service Order : Billing for complete Confirmation
entry.content:
Hi,

We have the following scenario:

A service order is created with multiple service items. Each day, several service confirmation items are created and marked as Completed (but not Final confirmation). At month-end, these completed confirmation items need to be invoiced.

Currently, the system only allows invoice generation when the service order status is set completed or service item status is completed or when a confirmation item is flagged as Final confirmation.

Is there any configuration or process that would allow billing of completed confirmation items regardless of whether the service item is completed or the confirmation item is marked as final?

Thank you.

Why does this appear and how to resolve it ?

entry.title: #CoE#GB Work Agreement Template Uloading and PR Approval Question in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
Dear Experts,
I would like to ask three questions of SAP Public Cloud.
1. Is there a standard template available for uploading work agreements in "Manage Workforce" app?
2. Where can I view the modification history(log) for CDS Views?
3. Can an administrator manually assign an approval substitute or designate who should approve a specific document(PR)?
Thank you!

entry.title: Header Condition in RFQ & Quotation - SAP Public Cloud 2508
entry.content: I am using SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud 2508, and I am unable to see RFQ- and quotation-based header conditions. Please confirm whether this functionality is available in this release.
